resources.string: Learn all the things that are\n essential to build a cool\n android application

Start Building your own app today,
 take help from this app.
See the code for particular
 feature of application

Share your own app with your
 friends and start helping the
 society in many different
 sectors

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout

	xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 	 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
 	 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 	 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 	 android:layout_height="match_parent"
 	 tools:context=".TextView.TextViewExample">

<TextView
 	 android:id="@+id/textView21"
 	android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 	android:text="This is a TextView"
 	android:textSize="28sp"
 	app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
 	app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
 	app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
 	android:textAlignment="center"
 	android:textColor="@color/black"
 	app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
 	android:gravity="center_horizontal" />
 </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
